idea:
"Pay1 is India's fastest growing and one of the most cost-effective and widest coverage go-to-market bridge between products/services, retailers and consumers.
Founded in 2012, the retail-tech platform empowers neighbourhood retail businesses by adding revenues streams and providing them access to both credit and technology. The in-depth analytics, plug-and-play nature and other platform capabilities make it a superior distribution channel for products and services companies trying to penetrate the vastly unorganised offline retail segment. The platform also provides companies with a gateway to explore untapped markets especially in tier 2/3 cities and helps them reach out to their desired audience by leveraging last mile connectivity and promotional assistance of the merchant network.
With a presence in 350+ cities and 200k+ merchants across India (more than 50K active every month), Pay1 is at the forefront of combining retail, finance, travel and consumer technology to create an integrated business ecosystem unique to the Indian markets. The platform already has a wide array of distinguished services such as Digital Payments, Banking Services, Travel Booking Services, Financial services (MFs, Insurance, loans, gold investments), Remittances, Recharges, Bill Payments and B2B commerce, and actively adding more.
This diverse selection of services provides the merchant network with immense growth opportunities previously unexplored and at the same time, the platform has also helped partners across industries increase their business especially from the largely untapped and under-explored unorganised retail segment."
name: Pay1
